name: Investment Exodus
title: Largest Foreign Investment Outflow
description: In 2023, the Netherlands experienced a significant foreign direct investment outflow totaling $332.5 billion, marking the largest outflow globally.

name: Clean Air Champions
title: Lowest PM2.5 Pollution Exposure
description: As of 2017, only 0.04% of the Dutch population was exposed to PM2.5 pollution levels exceeding WHO's Interim Target-3, showcasing the country's commitment to clean air.

name: Banking for All
title: Universal Financial Account Ownership
description: By 2021, 100% of Dutch adults aged 25 and older had access to a financial institution or mobile-money-service provider, ensuring financial inclusivity for all.

name: Youth Workforce Powerhouse
title: High Youth Employment and Participation Rates
description: In 2024, the Netherlands boasted a youth employment rate of 76.6% and a labor force participation rate of 83.5% for ages 15-24, reflecting strong engagement in the workforce.
